cause.description:
This year alot of foriegn exchange student mostly from Korea, came here just to find a family to come back and finish there schooling here in the united states. This is taking away from our students and it is also a very big liability for the host family the student and the school.
1. it is taking away from our own students
2. it is a huge liability for everyone
cause.mission: stop foriegn exchange students coming here without an organization
cause.name: foriegn Exchange Students
